sentences.en: Abbas, who was captured in Baghdad last year, was the mastermind of the Achille Lauro hijacking.
sentences.cn: 阿巴斯去年在巴格达被抓, 他是劫持“阿奇里·劳罗”号大型游艇事件的策划者.

sentences.en: After interrogation, he confessed that he is the mastermind of the criminal gang.
sentences.cn: 经过审讯, 他供出了他们这个犯罪团伙的谋主.

sentences.en: Black Dog finally confesses that Tianbao is the mastermind.
sentences.cn: 黑狗在警方的盘问下,终于供出受天宝指使.

sentences.en: Capture the building and Retreat back through the Wormhole with your Mastermind.
sentences.cn: 占领建筑然后让摄魂师通过虫洞撤回来.

sentences.en: Clearly determined rewards for participation in your mastermind alliance are an important factor in its harmony.
sentences.cn: 确定团员的报酬,是维持和谐的一项重大因素.

sentences.en: Description: The Teleport Units ability can move units within the radius to the mastermind.
sentences.cn: 描述: 传送单位技能可以将单位移动到以摄魂师为中心的一定范围内.

sentences.en: Even three common cobblers can surpass Zhuge Liang the Mastermind.
sentences.cn: 三个臭皮匠,顶个诸葛亮.

sentences.en: Hill & Knowlton, then the world's largest PR firm, served as mastermind the Kuwaiti campaign.
sentences.cn: 当时世界最大的公关公司伟达公关是“科威特”策划案的主要策划者.

sentences.en: Opposed to just running your Mastermind in you can use Wormhole.
sentences.cn: 除去上述方法外,还可以使用虫洞.

sentences.en: Out of all the commando's the Mastermind is the most versatile.
sentences.cn: 在所有特种兵中,摄魂师是最多面手得.

sentences.en: Put it on the Units you wish to teleport and then click near the Mastermind Presto.
sentences.cn: 把它放在您要传送得单位上然后单击摄魂师附近,就可以了.

sentences.en: Ridley, as commerce secretary, masterminded the privatisation.
sentences.cn: 时任商务部长的里德利策划推行了私有化。

sentences.en: The mastermind behind the scheme was executed after a brief trial.
sentences.cn: 阴谋的幕后策划者经过简短审讯便被处决了.

sentences.en: The phantom of the opera is now your mastermind.
sentences.cn: 歌剧魅影现在就在你的意识里.

sentences.en: The project was masterminded by Morris, then aged 29.
sentences.cn: 这个项目由时年29岁的莫里斯策划。

sentences.en: Three coBBlers with their wits comBined surpass Zhuge Liang the mastermind.
sentences.cn: 三个臭皮匠,胜过诸葛亮.

sentences.en: Wishes can become a reality if you mastermind a way to get what you want.
sentences.cn: 巨蟹:如果你手段高明并极力争取自己想要的,愿望很快就能变成现实.

trans.tran_cn: 策划者，操纵者，智多星，才子
trans.tran_en: someone who plans and organizes a complicated operation, especially a criminal operation
to think of, plan, and organize a large, important, and difficult operation
to think of, plan, and organize a large, important, and difficult operation
